body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Richard Gonzalez and the customer's name is Rose Lewis.  The conversation is about a random business (a Auto Repair Shop ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Nimbus Solutions. My name is John. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having trouble accessing my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help you with that. Could you please provide your account number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. Could you also please confirm the last four digits of your Social Security number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, Sarah. I have successfully verified your account. I will now proceed to reset your access.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Your account access has been restored. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sarah. Have a great day!
